tvdb: Danny and Ray sit at Carmen's bedside, who is in a coma. Danny tries to get through to Michelle, who tells him that she cannot deal with the danger anymore. Meanwhile, Bill breaks up with a devastated Beth and leaves to see Michelle and Danny kiss and assumes that they are back together. Phillip comforts Beth after her breakup. Later, Phillip is mad at Alan for his invoking of the pre-nup, but Olivia is hell-bent on preserving her marriage. Alexandra threatens to reveal that Alan faked his heart attack after she finds out the lengths he is going to, to make Phillip and Olivia pay. Tony decides to start over with Marah and they look to the future.
